price: Lalle haƙĩƙa Mun saukar da wani littãfi zuwa gare ku,* a cikinsa akwai ambatonku. Shin, to, bã ku hankalta?
arabic: لَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا فِيهِ ذِكۡرُكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: * Al'ummar Muhammad, tsirar Allah da amincinsa su tabbata a gare shi. An saukar musu da Alƙur'ãni, a cikinsa akwai ɗaukakarsu da darajarsu, dõmin wanda aka ambata, to, an ɗaukaka shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad anzalnā ilaykum kitāban fīhi dhik'rukum afalā taʿqilūna
